messages.message:
Good question. I haven't found a way to do it yet, aside from specifying in the question. Do you need this for a demo? I guess we could set it up in the structured prompt and create a variant for the time being? cc: @Hari 

This is good feedback for needing customisation for your config to run AIHub apps btw, thank you

Thanks team! No need to hotfix something right now, I will start running some demo's and if it turns out that it is a showstopper I will circle back... just wanted to make sure I wasnt missing something...
